user_id.description: The unique identifier of the user.

profile_url.description: The URL of the user's profile picture.

created_at.description: The timestamp of when the user was created, in milliseconds since epoch.

last_seen_at.description: The timestamp of the user's last activity, in milliseconds since epoch.

is_active.description: Indicates whether the user is currently active.

is_online.description: Indicates whether the user is currently online.

has_ever_logged_in.description: Indicates whether the user is currently active.

metadata.description: Custom metadata associated with the user.
